    åŸºäºSpringBootç‚¹é¤å°ç¨‹åºçš„å¼€å‘ã€å‰åç«¯ã€‘

    vuePress-theme-reco Â Â  2023

    åŸºäºSpringBootç‚¹é¤å°ç¨‹åºçš„å¼€å‘ã€å‰åç«¯ã€‘

    5/26/2023

    æœ‰ä¸ªå°ä¼™ä¼´ä¸´æ—¶æ‰¾åˆ°å°å­Ÿï¼Œè¦å¼€å‘ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹é¤çš„ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ—¶é—´æ¯”è¾ƒç€æ€¥ï¼Œç»™äº†2å¤©çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚

    é©¬é©¬è™è™çš„æå‡ºæ¥äº†ï¼Œå¤´å‘æ‰äº†ä¸€æ’®ï¼

    ä»Šå¹´æ‰¾å·¥ä½œçœŸç‰¹ä¹ˆéš¾ï¼985 å­¦ç”Ÿæ¶Œå…¥ç°æˆå½“å…¬åŠ¡å‘˜ï¼ŒåŒéçš„å­¦ç”Ÿæå¾—å‹åŠ›å¾ˆå¤§ã€‚ç¡•å£«æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å·¥ä½œçš„çœŸä¸å°‘ã€‚

    ä»Šå¹´å¤§å‚æ‹›ç”Ÿæ˜æ˜¾æ¯”å»å¹´å°‘äº†å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œæ›´éš¾å—çš„æ˜¯æœ‰çš„å°å‚æŠ€æœ¯é¢ç«Ÿç„¶æœ‰ä¸‰é¢ã€‚

    ä¸€ä½æ­ç”µçš„æœ‹å‹ï¼Œå»å¹´æ‰¾æˆ‘å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œä»–åæ¥å»äº†é˜¿é‡Œï¼Œä»Šå¹´ä»–å†…æ¨äº†å¾ˆå¤šå¸ˆå¼Ÿå¸ˆå¦¹éƒ½æ²¡æˆï¼Œå› ä¸ºç°åœ¨å¡å¾—å¤ªä¸¥äº†ã€‚é™¤å»å¤§å‚ï¼Œç°åœ¨ä¸€äº›éå¤§å‚çš„ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚å°çº¢ä¹¦ã€å¿«æ‰‹ã€æ–—é±¼ç­‰ï¼Œæ‹›è˜å²—ä½éƒ½å°‘äº†å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œ

    ä¸€ä½å°ä¼™ä¼´éå¸¸ä¼˜ç§€ï¼Œæ‹¿è¿‡å¥–ã€ç¼–ç¨‹ç±»çš„å¤§èµ›ä¹Ÿæ‹¿è¿‡å¥–ï¼ŒæŠ•å‡ºå»çš„ç®€å†æ³æ— éŸ³è®¯ã€‚

    å¯’æ°”é€¼äººã€‚

    å­—èŠ‚2022ç§‹æ‹›æœ‰8000hcï¼Œä»Šå¹´2023å±Šç§‹æ‹›åªæœ‰3000hcï¼Œå‡å°‘äº†60%ã€‚é˜¿é‡Œç§‹æ‹›8.18æ‰å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå¾€å¹´7æœˆä»½å°±å¼€å§‹äº†ï¼Œhcä¹Ÿå°‘äº†å¾ˆå¤šã€‚ç°åœ¨å„å¤§å…¬å¸çš„è½¬æ­£å¡å¾—éå¸¸ä¸¥ã€‚æœ‰çš„å…¬å¸æ¯”ä¾‹6:1ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¯´6ä¸ªäººè½¬æ­£1ä¸ªã€‚

    é‚£ä¹ˆæ˜å¹´åé¢å°±ä¸šå°±ä¼šå¥½å—ï¼Ÿ

    ä»Šå¹´å¹´åˆäº’è”ç½‘å¼€å§‹è£å‘˜ï¼Œç„¶ååé¢å¼€å§‹ç¼©å‡æ‹›è˜åé¢ã€‚æ®æˆ‘æ‰€çŸ¥ï¼Œä»Šå¹´å¾ˆå¤šç¡•å£«æ‰¾å·¥ä½œéƒ½å¾ˆéš¾ï¼Œç°åœ¨åˆæœ‰å¾ˆå¤š985çš„å­¦ç”Ÿå¼€å§‹å‘å¿åŸå‘å±•ã€‚

    ä¸‹é¢ä»‹ç»ä¸‹æœ¬ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„å°ä¼™ä¼´ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒå¼€å‘ä¸‹ï¼

    # ä¸€ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½ä»‹ç»

    æœ¬ç‚¹å•ç³»ç»Ÿä¸»è¦æ˜¯åŸºäºSpringBootæ¡†æ¶å’Œå°ç¨‹åºå¼€å‘çš„ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯ä¸ºå½“ä»£äººä»¬çš„ç”Ÿæ´»æä¾›æ›´ä¾¿åˆ©ã€æ›´é«˜æ•ˆçš„æœåŠ¡ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ºè¥é”€è€…æä¾›æ›´å¥½çš„ç³»ç»Ÿè¿›è¡Œç”¨æˆ·ã€å•†å“ã€è®¢å•ç­‰ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€‚ è¯¥ç³»ç»Ÿæ‰€å®ç°çš„ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½æ¨¡å—å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    å‰å°ï¼š 1ï¼‰æ³¨å†Œç™»å½• 2ï¼‰ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ â‘ ã€€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ªäººä¿¡æ¯ â‘¡ã€€ä¿®æ”¹æ”¶è´§åœ°å€ â‘¢ã€€ç§¯åˆ† 3ï¼‰å•†å“æµè§ˆ 4ï¼‰å•†å“æœç´¢ 5ï¼‰è´­ç‰©è½¦ 6ï¼‰ä¸‹å•æ”¯ä»˜ åå°ï¼š 1ï¼‰æ³¨å†Œç™»å½• 2ï¼‰ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ â‘ ã€€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ªäººä¿¡æ¯ â‘¡ã€€ä¿®æ”¹å¯†ç  3ï¼‰ç”¨æˆ·ç®¡ç† â‘ ã€€å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç† â‘¡ã€€ç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç† 4ï¼‰å•†å“ç®¡ç† â‘ ã€€å•†å“åˆ†ç±»ç®¡ç† â‘¡ã€€å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç† â‘¢ã€€åº“å­˜ä¸é”€é‡ 5ï¼‰è®¢å•ç®¡ç† å‰å°æä¾›ç”¨æˆ·æ³¨å†Œç™»å½•ã€ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒã€æµè§ˆå•†å“ã€æŸ¥æ‰¾å•†å“ã€æ·»åŠ å•†å“å…¥è´­ç‰©è½¦ã€è®¢å•æäº¤ä»¥åŠæ”¯ä»˜ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚åå°æä¾›ç®¡ç†æ³¨å†Œç™»å½•ã€ä¿®æ”¹å¯†ç ã€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ªäººä¿¡æ¯ã€ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€ç®¡ç†å‘˜ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†ã€å•†å“åˆ†é…ç®¡ç†ã€åº“å­˜ä¸é”€é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ã€è®¢å•ç®¡ç†ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

    # äºŒï¼Œå¼€å‘è¯­è¨€ä»‹ç»

    é‡‡ç”¨çš„SpringBoot+Vue+å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºè¿›è¡Œå¼€å‘ï¼Œæ•°æ®åº“é‡‡ç”¨çš„æ˜¯Mysqlã€‚

    # ä¸‰ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿçš„ç•Œé¢ä»‹ç»

    # å››ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç æ¼”ç¤º

    /**
 * ç™»å½•ç›¸å…³
 */
@RequestMapping("users")
@RestController
public class UserController{

	@Autowired
	private UserService userService;

	@Autowired
	private TokenService tokenService;

	/**
	 * ç™»å½•
	 */
	@IgnoreAuth
	@PostMapping(value = "/login")
	public R login(String username, String password, String captcha, HttpServletRequest request) {
		UserEntity user = userService.selectOne(new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>().eq("username", username));
		if(user==null || !user.getPassword().equals(password)) {
			return R.error("è´¦å·æˆ–å¯†ç ä¸æ­£ç¡®");
		}
		String token = tokenService.generateToken(user.getId(),username, "users", user.getRole());
		return R.ok().put("token", token);
	}

	/**
	 * æ³¨å†Œ
	 */
	@IgnoreAuth
	@PostMapping(value = "/register")
	public R register(@RequestBody UserEntity user){
//    	ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(user);
    	if(userService.selectOne(new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>().eq("username", user.getUsername())) !=null) {
    		return R.error("ç”¨æˆ·å·²å­˜åœ¨");
    	}
        userService.insert(user);
        return R.ok();
    }

	/**
	 * é€€å‡º
	 */
	@GetMapping(value = "logout")
	public R logout(HttpServletRequest request) {
		request.getSession().invalidate();
		return R.ok("é€€å‡ºæˆåŠŸ");
	}

	/**
     * å¯†ç é‡ç½®
     */
    @IgnoreAuth
	@RequestMapping(value = "/resetPass")
    public R resetPass(String username, HttpServletRequest request){
    	UserEntity user = userService.selectOne(new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>().eq("username", username));
    	if(user==null) {
    		return R.error("è´¦å·ä¸å­˜åœ¨");
    	}
    	user.setPassword("123456");
        userService.update(user,null);
        return R.ok("å¯†ç å·²é‡ç½®ä¸ºï¼š123456");
    }

	/**
     * åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping("/page")
    public R page(@RequestParam Map<String, Object> params,UserEntity user){
        EntityWrapper<UserEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>();
    	PageUtils page = userService.queryPage(params, MPUtil.sort(MPUtil.between(MPUtil.allLike(ew, user), params), params));
        return R.ok().put("data", page);
    }

	/**
     * åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping("/list")
    public R list( UserEntity user){
       	EntityWrapper<UserEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>();
      	ew.allEq(MPUtil.allEQMapPre( user, "user"));
        return R.ok().put("data", userService.selectListView(ew));
    }

    /**
     * ä¿¡æ¯
     */
    @RequestMapping("/info/{id}")
    public R info(@PathVariable("id") String id){
        UserEntity user = userService.selectById(id);
        return R.ok().put("data", user);
    }

    /**
     * è·å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„sessionç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
     */
    @RequestMapping("/session")
    public R getCurrUser(HttpServletRequest request){
    	Long id = (Long)request.getSession().getAttribute("userId");
        UserEntity user = userService.selectById(id);
        return R.ok().put("data", user);
    }

    /**
     * ä¿å­˜
     */
    @PostMapping("/save")
    public R save(@RequestBody UserEntity user){
//    	ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(user);
    	if(userService.selectOne(new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>().eq("username", user.getUsername())) !=null) {
    		return R.error("ç”¨æˆ·å·²å­˜åœ¨");
    	}
        userService.insert(user);
        return R.ok();
    }

    /**
     * ä¿®æ”¹
     */
    @RequestMapping("/update")
    public R update(@RequestBody UserEntity user){
//        ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(user);
    	UserEntity u = userService.selectOne(new EntityWrapper<UserEntity>().eq("username", user.getUsername()));
    	if(u!=null && u.getId()!=user.getId() && u.getUsername().equals(user.getUsername())) {
    		return R.error("ç”¨æˆ·åå·²å­˜åœ¨ã€‚");
    	}
        userService.updateById(user);//å…¨éƒ¨æ›´æ–°
        return R.ok();
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤
     */
    @RequestMapping("/delete")
    public R delete(@RequestBody Long[] ids){
        userService.deleteBatchIds(Arrays.asList(ids));
        return R.ok();
    }
}



    /**
 * è®¢å•
 * åç«¯æ¥å£
 * @author å°å­Ÿvï¼šjishulearn
 * @email
 * @date 2022-06-26 09:41:24
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/orders")
public class OrdersController {
    @Autowired
    private OrdersService ordersService;
    @Autowired
    private CaipinxinxiService caipinxinxiService;


    /**
     * åç«¯åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping("/page")
    public R page(@RequestParam Map<String, Object> params,OrdersEntity orders,
		HttpServletRequest request){
    	if(!request.getSession().getAttribute("role").toString().equals("ç®¡ç†å‘˜")) {
    		orders.setUserid((Long)request.getSession().getAttribute("userId"));
    	}

        EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity>();
		PageUtils page = ordersService.queryPage(params, MPUtil.sort(MPUtil.between(MPUtil.likeOrEq(ew, orders), params), params));
        return R.ok().put("data", page);
    }

    /**
     * å‰ç«¯åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping("/list")
    public R list(@RequestParam Map<String, Object> params,OrdersEntity orders, HttpServletRequest request){
        EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity>();
		PageUtils page = ordersService.queryPage(params, MPUtil.sort(MPUtil.between(MPUtil.likeOrEq(ew, orders), params), params));
        return R.ok().put("data", page);
    }

	/**
     * åˆ—è¡¨
     */
    @RequestMapping("/lists")
    public R list( OrdersEntity orders){
       	EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper<OrdersEntity>();
      	ew.allEq(MPUtil.allEQMapPre( orders, "orders"));
        return R.ok().put("data", ordersService.selectListView(ew));
    }

	 /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢
     */
    @RequestMapping("/query")
    public R query(OrdersEntity orders){
        EntityWrapper< OrdersEntity> ew = new EntityWrapper< OrdersEntity>();
 		ew.allEq(MPUtil.allEQMapPre( orders, "orders"));
		OrdersView ordersView =  ordersService.selectView(ew);
		return R.ok("æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•æˆåŠŸ").put("data", ordersView);
    }

    /**
     * åç«¯è¯¦æƒ…
     */
    @RequestMapping("/info/{id}")
    public R info(@PathVariable("id") Long id){
        OrdersEntity orders = ordersService.selectById(id);
        return R.ok().put("data", orders);
    }

    /**
     * å‰ç«¯è¯¦æƒ…
     */
    @RequestMapping("/detail/{id}")
    public R detail(@PathVariable("id") Long id){
        OrdersEntity orders = ordersService.selectById(id);
        return R.ok().put("data", orders);
    }




    /**
     * åç«¯ä¿å­˜
     */
    @RequestMapping("/save")
    public R save(@RequestBody OrdersEntity orders, HttpServletRequest request){
    	orders.setId(new Date().getTime()+new Double(Math.floor(Math.random()*1000)).longValue());
    	//ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(orders);
    	orders.setUserid((Long)request.getSession().getAttribute("userId"));

        ordersService.insert(orders);
        return R.ok();
    }

    /**
     * å‰ç«¯ä¿å­˜
     */
    @RequestMapping("/add")
    public R add(@RequestBody OrdersEntity orders, HttpServletRequest request){
    	orders.setId(new Date().getTime()+new Double(Math.floor(Math.random()*1000)).longValue());
    	//ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(orders);
        CaipinxinxiEntity caipinxinxiEntity = caipinxinxiService.selectById(orders.getGoodid());
        if(caipinxinxiEntity.getStore()<orders.getBuynumber()){
            return R.error("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
        }
        caipinxinxiEntity.setStore(caipinxinxiEntity.getStore()-orders.getBuynumber());
        caipinxinxiEntity.setSell(caipinxinxiEntity.getSell()+orders.getBuynumber());
        caipinxinxiService.updateById(caipinxinxiEntity);
        ordersService.insert(orders);
        return R.ok();
    }

    /**
     * ä¿®æ”¹
     */
    @RequestMapping("/update")
    public R update(@RequestBody OrdersEntity orders, HttpServletRequest request){
        //ValidatorUtils.validateEntity(orders);
        ordersService.updateById(orders);//å…¨éƒ¨æ›´æ–°
        return R.ok();
    }

    å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³å­¦ä¹ é¡¹ç›®å¼€å‘ï¼Œè¯·å…³æ³¨æˆ‘ã€‚ä¸€èµ·äº¤æµè¿›æ­¥ï¼ŒåŠ æ²¹å¥¥é‡Œç»™ï¼å›å¤ï¼šé¡¹ç›®å¤§å…¨ï¼Œå…¨æ˜¯å¹²è´§ï¼

    ç»™å‡†å¤‡ç§‹æ‹›çš„æœ‹å‹ä¸€äº›å»ºè®®ï¼š

    é“¶è¡Œå’Œå¾ˆå¤šçš„å›½ä¼æ‹›è˜é›†ä¸­åœ¨9æœˆä»½ã€10æœˆä»½ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥å‡†å¤‡äº†ã€‚

    4ï¼Œèƒ½å»è¯»ä¸ªç¡•å£«å°±å»è¯»ä¸ªç¡•å£«å§ï¼Œä¸‰å¹´åèµ·ç‚¹æ›´é«˜äº›ï¼Œè€Œä¸”åˆ°æ—¶å€™å¯èƒ½å°±ä¸šæœºä¼šä¼šå¤šäº›ã€‚

    5ï¼Œå…¨é¢å‘å±•ã€‚ç°åœ¨æ‰¾å·¥ä½œçœŸçš„éœ€è¦æ‰“é€šå„ä¸ªæ–¹é¢çš„èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œå…«è‚¡æ–‡å¾—ä¼šï¼Œé¡¹ç›®å¾—æœ‰ï¼Œç®—æ³•å¾—ä¼šï¼Œæ¯”èµ›å¾—å‚åŠ ï¼Œå‚åŠ è¿‡å¼€æºé¡¹ç›®ã€‚

    åŸºäºNode+Vue.jsé«˜è´¨é‡å•†åŸç³»ç»Ÿçš„å¼€å‘ï¸ åŸºäºSpringBootéŸ³ä¹ç¿»å”±ç½‘ç«™çš„è®¾è®¡ä¸å®ç°ï¸
